overview_of_class: The strategic marketing communications process that includes consumer insight and research, market segmentation, brand positioning, communication messages and media decisions. Integrates brand communications with other aspects of marketing including product strategy, pricing, retailing. Students perform case studies and complete a series of writing-intensive assignments. Prerequisite: IMC 301, 302, admission to IMC Certificate Program (may be taken in the same quarter student applies for program admission).
name: Integrated Marketing Communications Strategy
subject: IMC
